'''LanternSmith''' is a flow arts performance and education project associated with [[Charlie Cushing]]. LanternSmith focuses on [[meteor]] and other prop performance, and is credited in the development and popularization of the Oxbow Meteor manufactured by [[Flowtoys]].<ref name="flowtoys-oxbow">{{cite web |url=https://flowtoys.com/oxbow |title=Oxbow |publisher=Flowtoys}}</ref>
